name: Touhou Reimu's Christmas
description:
Touhou Reimu's Christmas

A christmas game featuring touhou characters.

How to play:

You can move with AWSD or with the arrow keys.

Press space or enter to send gift.

Press escape to pause and r to restart.

There are 3 endings depending on the gifts delivered: bad, neutral and good.

Cómo jugar:

Puedes moverte con las teclas AWSD o con flechas. 

Presiona espacio o intro para enviar un regalo.

Presione escape para pausar y r para reiniciar.

Hay 3 finales dependiendo de los regalos entregados: malo, neutral y bueno.

CREDITS:

Game by IvChill.

Touhou is owned by ZUN.

Music by SoulProdMusic from Pixabay (Jingle Bells / Christmas Hip Hop)

Music by Grand_Project from Pixabay (We wish you a Merry Christmas)

Music by SoundGalleryBy from Pixabay (Christmas Music - Magical Fairy Tale for Children Kids)

Music by Cloud-10 from Freesound (Christmas Melody 1)
